text:
In the same research framework as the previous project, we participated in a second project with the Arrels Fundació. The staff of La Llar Pere Barnés told us about the need to turn the dining room, the shared area of the building, into a multipurpose, flexible space. 
 Llibre Blanc is a catalogue that studies the space and its possibilities to be transformed. The proposals presented in Llibre Blanc are diverse and follow sustainability criteria, that is why we did not limit ourselves to recommend furniture to buy but we also presented different ways to transform and take advantage of the current furniture or to create adapted furniture from leftover material. 
 We believe that it is important that a space like La Llar Pere Barnés adapts to the needs of both employees and residents. In order to be able to involve the residents in the decisions, we ended up materializing this book, a technical and flexible document, in a table game. Thus, taking into account the profile of the residents, the game allows everyone to contribute their ideas in a playful and simple way. 
 Note that all the material used during this project in all its phases is reused. We wanted to commit to the idea of upcycling, so we took advantage of scraps of wood, textile leftover, already owned material...
